title: Correction to: Seasonal organization of tintinnid community by temperature preference and LOD size-class in a subtropical brackish embayment
content: This is a correction to: Jingyuan Li, Ping Du, Haibo Li, Yuan Zhao, Ming Mao, Li Zhao, Yi Dong, Yepeng Xu, Gérald Grégori, Wuchang Zhang, Seasonal organization of tintinnid community by temperature preference and LOD size-class in a subtropical brackish embayment, Journal of Plankton Research, Volume 46, Issue 2, March/April 2024, Pages 228–240, https://doi.org/10.1093/plankt/fbae005
siteTitle: Journal of Plankton Research Current Issue
